mapper.select: SELECT i.space_id, title, area, type, total_rate, jjim_cnt, image_name FROM (SELECT space_id, image_name FROM SPACE_IMAGE WHERE rowid in (SELECT max(rowid) FROM SPACE_IMAGE GROUP BY space_id)) i ,(SELECT space_id, title, area, type, total_rate, jjim_cnt FROM SPACE ORDER BY total_rate DESC)spa WHERE spa.space_id = i.space_id AND ROWNUM < 5

SELECT i.space_id, title, area, type, total_rate, jjim_cnt, image_name FROM (SELECT space_id, image_name FROM SPACE_IMAGE WHERE rowid in (SELECT max(rowid) FROM SPACE_IMAGE GROUP BY space_id)) i ,(SELECT space_id, title, area, type, total_rate, jjim_cnt FROM SPACE ORDER BY jjim_cnt DESC)spa WHERE spa.space_id = i.space_id AND ROWNUM < 5
SELECT * FROM SPACE_IMAGE i, (SELECT space_id, title, area, type FROM SPACE WHERE ROWNUM < 13) spa WHERE spa.space_id = i.space_id ORDER BY spa.space_id DESC
SELECT s.space_id, title, area, type, image_name, jjim_cnt FROM SPACE s , SPACE_IMAGE i WHERE s.space_id = i.space_id ORDER BY s.space_id DESC
SELECT s.space_id, title, area, type, image_name, jjim_cnt FROM SPACE s , SPACE_IMAGE i WHERE s.space_id = i.space_id AND s.memId = #{memId} ORDER BY s.space_id DESC
SELECT s.space_id, title, area, type, image_name, jjim_cnt FROM space s, jjim j, SPACE_IMAGE i WHERE s.space_id = j.space_id AND j.memid = #{memId} AND j.jjim_check=1 AND s.space_id = i.space_id

SELECT * FROM MEMBER m, ( SELECT * FROM SPACE s NATURAL JOIN SPACE_IMAGE WHERE space_id = #{space_id} ) ss
WHERE ss.memId = m.memId
SELECT s.space_id, title, type, area, image_name, jjim_cnt FROM space s, space_image i WHERE s.space_id = i.space_id ORDER BY jjim_cnt DESC
SELECT s.space_id, title, type, area, image_name, jjim_cnt FROM space s, space_image i WHERE s.space_id = i.space_id ORDER BY total_rate DESC

SELECT s.space_id, s.title, s.type, s.area, i.image_name, jjim_cnt FROM space s, space_image i WHERE (s.${condition} = #{keyword} OR s.${condition} LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%') AND s.space_id = i.space_id

SELECT s.space_id, s.title, s.type, s.area, i.image_name, jjim_cnt FROM space s, space_image i WHERE (s.area = #{area} OR s.area LIKE '%'||#{area}||'%') AND (s.title = #{title} OR s.title LIKE '%'||#{title}||'%') AND s.space_id = i.space_id
